title: Home
welcome: I am a second-year M.Sc. student at Osaka University, Japan and am project researcher at SANKEN (The Institute of Scientific and Industrial Research at Osaka University). I am interested in (RQ1) real-time forecasting and (RQ2) causal discovery in time-series data. I am fortunate to be advised by Prof. Yasushi Sakurai and Prof. Yasuko Matsubara at SANKEN, Osaka University. I recieved my B.Sc. degrees from Osaka University advised by Prof. Makoto Onizuka in March, 2023. I am participating in Humanware Innovation Program to deepen my knowledge in other fields.
profile: I am a M.Sc. student at Osaka University, Japan. I am interested in time-series analysis.
